patthana15.52:1.1: Noupādānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.52:2.1: Upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.52:3.1: Nokilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
